VII.i.2.E.1.l
.
Handling Requests for Continuation of Benefits
If a surviving spouse notifies VA of their remarriage, take the steps described in the table below.
Step
Action
1
Send the survivor
VA Form 21-686c, Application Request to Add and/or Remove Dependents
, to complete.
2
Ask the survivor whether their current spouse is a Veteran (Block 12A on
VA Form 21-686c
)
.
3
If the current spouse is a Veteran
ask the survivor to
provide the spouse’s Social Security number or VA file number (Block 11C or 12B on
VA Form 21-686c
)
indicate whether the current spouse is receiving VA benefits, and
cross-reference the survivor’s and current spouse’s claims folders, if necessary.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
